title: What is this?
body: I have a number of champion skins that show boxes in front of them, any idea what they mean?

replies.body: These are chroma colors!  You can unlock color palette for some skins and champions through the in-game store.  There's currently a [sale ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/frequently-asked-questions-about-chromas-packs)right now where you can obtain some with IP (normally they cost RP only).  Check it out if you're interested!
